divs: sighting detailsi usually go out into the garden at night to study the stars, i have seen these before and really didn't know where or to report my sightings, but then came across your site on a documentary i was watching. i was in the garden about 10pm i stay out for roughly two hours sometimes just popping in to make myself a cup of coffee. i saw like a star but was moving at a steady pace i usually see quite a few nearly every night, at first i thought they could be satellites but then i noticed one seem to manoeuvre around a star. but it didn't seem as high as the stars, it was definitely in or just above our atmosphere. they don't flash or have any beacons they shine just like a star, they also seem at a steady speed but sometimes slow almost a halt and then speed up again?? i'm really baffled on this and could do with some help understanding what this could be, this is not a hoax as you are very welcome to come and see for yourself. i have also shown members of my family these as well. many thanks *(wit's name deleted--cms\sg).
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Taunton
There were no other sightings in Taunton on or around October 4th 2010
